snippet: Poor weather drove up food prices, limiting room for the central bank to maneuver to support the economy and exports unexpectedly declined.
lead_paragraph: Poor weather drove up food prices, limiting room for the central bank to maneuver to support the economy and exports unexpectedly declined.

headline.main: Consumer Inflation Rises in China as Food Prices Jump
headline.print_headline: Consumer Inflation Rises in China as Food Prices Jump
